Posts.Content: Hi Liz, just came by this site by chance. Read your post..and begin to cry. Here is 2012, I am going though the same problem with radiation abscess on left breast since April of this year. NOW I have wound a (Hole) in my left breast the size of lemon. Feels like it is all the way to my back when I pack it with gauges. God Bless You for that information about the Vac machine. I have an doctor's appointment this coming Wednesday. I will be discussing this course of treatment with him. Once again thank you.....God Bless You.,  lyndaps
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy Abscess After Radiation Treatment???
